chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Human Heart
chapters.info: Laman Damodred, p. 94—King of Cairhien, and Moiraine's uncle. He was killed in the battle of the Shining Walls along with his brothers Moressin and Aldecain. He was a distant man who burned with ambition. Moiraine believes he never married because even becoming queen of Cairhien was not sufficient enticement to marry him. See also Damodred, Aldecain; Damodred, Moiraine; Damodred, Moressin; Damodred, Taringail.
